ygData.subject: Re: Need Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You do not want to mess with shadowmen.  After about an hour of killing them they will be instant aggressive KOS.  And you will die.  I know L50 paladins
ygData.messageBody:
> where you can fite them. If your shaman can pull single shadow men and you
> can damage them that might be an option too. Going to need a lot of healing
> and MR buffing.

You do not want to mess with shadowmen. After about an hour of killing
them they will be instant aggressive KOS. And you will die. I know
L50 paladins that accidentally trip up on shadowmen camps who are slain
before the even know what hit them. My advice, don't bother shadowmen.

> Powerleveling is still lots and lots of killing - dont expect that you will
> get like a level in an hour or 2. Getting a bubble of XP per hour is what I
> would consider really good.

At L23 you can do a level in 2 hours by powerleveling. If you are
bumming around with similar level people who are gaining exp with
you then I don't consider that powerleveling, and most people would
call that partying. One bubble exp per hour only applies to levels
over L35. I've been truly powerleveling people in south karana, and
I took a L23 to L24 in a little over one hour. You just need to know
what you are doing and how to do it.

A bard is a melee/memblur machine. No other memblur class can tote
these claims, as they are all manabased and we all know manabased
powerleveling creates enormous downtime. A level 50 shaman took
2!!! hours to take my L19 to L20. It took me 30 mins to take her
twink from L19 to L20.

rough estimates:

centaur archer = 1/4 bubble exp to L19
centaur courser = 1/3 bubble exp to L19
centaur charger = 1/2 bubble exp to L19

A high level bard can pull solo centaurs from the camp, and bring
them to about 50 - 100 hp and then charm them and voila. The
twinkee now has a red con mob with 50 hp to slay. The bard charm
will keep the npc aggressive on the bard while the twinkee kills.

Chargers are no joke either, with chains+victory those L33 beasts
can still really mess me up if they get lucky.

Harmonic.
